Jogo desde o 1.5 e voltei a jogar a pouco tempo novamente, mas sinceramente, todos os meus amigos estão desanimando de praticar pela quantidade de xiters que estão jogando. Minha conta principal eu tento preservar, mas quando jogo, ou no time adversário, ou no meu time tem xiter. Não é choro, é constatação. Se deixar de graça a intenção era não deixar o jogo morrer, monetizar com skin e caixa como prêmio para os xiters normalmente não está dando certo. EU NÃO GASTO MAIS NADA NO CSGO E ACONSELHO QUE TODOS FAÇAM O MESMO! Só assim para algo mudar nesse jogo. Hoje eu não recomendo, pois o jogo é para nossas horas de lazer, e passar raiva no território tomado por hack é deprimente.
Всё было бы отлично, если бы не софтеры и несправедливый VAC бан ни за что. Что интересно, не играл месяц - прилетел патруль, а потом сменился ваком.

This game is okay. Id say the chips a 3.7. They had the potato content and not too much grease but you could tell that it wasnt as fresh as it could have been. For the Burger, a 1.5. The fillet was clearly pumped up from its original size. The assembly was also everywhere with half the lettuce not even in the burger, the bread also a disappointment it wasnt like real bread, you could taste the fakeness of it. Moving on to the wings which brings this shop its overall 3.9 rating. Fam, these wings....a 4.2 big man. The chicken itself smoothly came off the bone and the texture was succulent. The breading was flaky and very presentable. But most of all it was tasty, you could feel a bit of heat in the back. I would have given it a 5 if all the 3 wings i ordered were consistent. 2/3 wings were on a new level, but 1 of them was....ehhhhhh. The chicken definitely went through a hard time which that 1 wing belonged to. The experience of the shop is cas, but not much seating. So its more of a pick up and go type beat. Bossman was safe and gave us a FREE drink for advertising their shop. Madness. Very friendly customer service in my opinion. But anyway, in conclusion id give this chicken shop a 3.9, good experience and chips and excellent but inconsistent wings. If you like burgers id suggest u do a quick likkle 180 back to the station.
its pretty good but the there are too many hackers so you will need to buy prime
